new.message:
Look for a folder by entering its name above.
Not found? Type in the desired name and click on it below to create a new folder.

chooseparent.message: By clicking on any radio button from below you place your new folder to a chosen one

caption.message: Create new directory in a chosen parent directory from the list below
caption.description: Caption to show on mouse over

anotherparentdir.message: You can now save to any listed sub folder if its name is more appropriate or make it to a parent
